"We are gathered for a ceremony of entry into the French nationality, for a reunion" @fhollande # TirailleursSénégalais
"When Europe falls in the great war, France recruits more than 230,000 soldiers in Africa" ​​@fhollande # TirailleursSénégalais
"Tomorrow, I'll be at the Chemin des Dames, where the Senegalese tirailleurs were on the front line" @fhollande # TirailleursSénégalais
"In the darkness of summer 1940, it is from Africa that came the light of the first victories" @fhollande # TirailleursSénégalais
"From 1940 to 1945, 160,000 Senegalese riflemen served" @fhollande # TirailleursSénégalais
"You are the survivors of this time, you are part of the memory of the history of France" @fhollande # TirailleursSénégalais
"Those who fought for France and make the choice to live there, must be able to become French" @fhollande # TirailleursSénégalais
"It took a long fight for France to finally agree to repair this injustice" @fhollande # TirailleursSénégalais
"All the former skirmishers who reside in France and who will request it, will obtain the French nationality" @fhollande
